name: Harold Tales - Monster Life <MV> Disc 1
description:
A quick, simplistic Runtimepackage oriented game. Disc 1 HTML series.

-<Plot>-

The Harolds are invading the isolated island of Monster Vale, a land that is devoid of human beings.

The strongest monster, Darklord, proved no match. In addition, the monsters turn into these Harolds themselves. Something the citizens are fearing.

With no hope of fighting against it, a Harold unlike any other offers her assistance in order to erase the Harolds. By having a bat, a slime, an orc and a minotaur traverse through the Harold realm in order to find the culprit behind this mysterious disaster.

Will you be the monsters' guide to their respite from these Harolds, who will change these monsters into their spitting image without a care in the world?

-<Mechanics>-

Very short minigames and a lengthy battle. No heavy exploration aspects. A hidden secret can be found within the game. Simplistic default assets for the majority of the game.
